thread.title: Trump backs Middle East peace, even if not tied to two-state solution
thread.title_full: Trump backs Middle East peace, even if not tied to two-state solution

title: Trump backs Middle East peace, even if not tied to two-state solution
text:
World News | Tue Feb 14, 2017 | 8:12pm EST Trump backs Middle East peace, even if not tied to two-state solution U.S. President Donald Trump addresses a joint news conference with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau at the White House in Washington, U.S., February 13, 2017. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque 
WASHINGTON U.S. President Donald Trump supports the goal of peace between Israel and the Palestinians, even if it doesn't involve the two-state solution, a senior White House official said on Tuesday. 
Speaking a day before Trump holds a White House meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, the official said peace was the ultimate goal. 
"Whether that comes in the form of a twoâ€“state solution if that's what the parties want, or something else," the official said. 
(Reporting by Steve Holland; Writing by Eric Beech; Editing by Eric Walsh) Next In World News
